item.title: Hello World Python AWS Lambda
item.description: This is a step by step tutorial to create a Dockerized AWS Python Lambda function. Copying/pasting each command as-is will create a running dockerized python lambda function in your aws account. It’s aimed at experienced engineers who know how to write software and just want to run a lambda function. The tutorial aggregates a lot of the documentation and gotchya’s one runs into while developing a lambda function for the first time.
